name: checkrooms
description: Check if a set of rooms are free during a given period.

options.name: rooms
options.description: The room codes to query, separated by whitespace and case-insensitive.

options.name: times
options.description: The hours to query in 24-hour time, separated by whitespace (like '8 12'). Defaults to current hour.

name: labfree
description: Check if the labs in the McNulty building are free during an hour-long period.

options.name: times
options.description: The hours to query in 24-hour time, separated by whitespace (like '8 12'). Defaults to current hour.

name: timetable
description: Find a timetable for a course and day

options.name: course
options.description: The code for the course you want to query. Case insensitive.

options.name: day
options.description: The day of this week to check for. Defaults to today.

name: ping
description: Check if the bot is currently alive.

name: updateme
description: Register your data to get updates by DM.

options.name: course
options.description: The code for your course, or blank to unregister. Case insensitive.

options.name: nextday
options.description: Whether or not you want to receive updates the day before.

options.name: ignoretutorials
options.description: Whether or not you want to see tutorials in your timetable.

options.name: autoupdate
options.description: Update your course code between years. Will be cleared once you leave, hopefully.

name: myinfo
description: Check your info in the bot's database.

name: updatechannel
description: Register this channel to get updates by DM.

options.name: course
options.description: The code for your course, or blank to unregister. Case insensitive.

options.name: nextday
options.description: Whether or not you want to receive updates the day before.

options.name: ignoretutorials
options.description: Whether or not you want to see tutorials in your timetable.

options.name: autoupdate
options.description: Update your course code between years. Will be cleared once you leave, hopefully.

name: channelinfo
description: Check this channel's info in the bot's database.
